title: Should lore play a bigger part in game?
body:
With a few neiche exceptions (notably Xayah/Rakan), most champions keep their lore well seperate from their in-game-impact.

While some champions reflect their lore in their playstyles, Ivern being a good example bringing his pasifict approach to jungle clearing.

Then there are those who less reflect their lore in game. Take Swain for example; the greatest tactitan in runeterra, whose only tactic is to sprout wings and run headlong into the enemy.

But should there be more lore in game? More high risk high reward interactions like Kha'Zix and Rengar. Some reason to purposefully pick (or not pick) allies/rivals of champs either your team or the enemy picks. To add an extra dynamic to the game.


what do you reckon?
